info.name: Pinterest - Images Only
info.description: Hide the descriptions of pins, leaving just the image.
info.additionalInfo: If you're already on the Pinterest web site when installing this userstyle, you'll need to reload the page. Same goes for uninstalling or disabling it. After that, everything should display properly. Note: I rarely use this userstyle, so if it's not working, or you feel like there's something else that should be hidden, feel free to report it using the Send Feedback button below.
